t.t-foreach: docs.filtered(lambda x: (x.company_id.id == emp[0])and (x.employee_id.category_ids.id == emp[6]) and (x.department_id.parent_id.id == emp[2]) and (x.department_id.id == emp[4]) )

t.t-esc: o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'BASIC').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'HRA').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'MEDICAL').total

t.t-value: o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'BASIC').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'HRA').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'MEDICAL').total + sec_gross_salary

t.t-foreach: docs.filtered(lambda x: (x.company_id.id == emp[0])and (x.employee_id.category_ids.id == emp[6]) and (x.department_id.parent_id.id == emp[2]) and (x.department_id.id == emp[4]) )

t.t-esc: o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'BASIC').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'HRA').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'MEDICAL').total

t.t-value: o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'BASIC').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'HRA').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'MEDICAL').total + sec_gross_salary

t.t-esc: (o.earnings_total-((o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'MOBILE').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'OTHERS_ALW').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'INCENTIVE').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'OT').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'ARREAR').total)-(o.com_otHours*o.otRate)))

t.t-value: sec_totalEarn+((o.earnings_total-((o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'MOBILE').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'OTHERS_ALW').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'INCENTIVE').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'OT').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'ARREAR').total)-(o.com_otHours*o.otRate))))

t.t-esc: ((o.earnings_total-((o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'ARREAR').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'MOBILE').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'OTHERS_ALW').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'INCENTIVE').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'OT').total)-(o.com_otHours*o.otRate)))-o.deduction_total)

t.t-value: sec_net+(o.earnings_total-((o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'ARREAR').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'MOBILE').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'OTHERS_ALW').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'INCENTIVE').total+o.line_ids.filtered(lambda line: line.code == 'OT').total)-(o.com_otHours*o.otRate))-o.deduction_total)
